snippet.title: Fukushima on Thursday: Prospects starting to look good
snippet.description:
Fukushima on Thursday: Prospects starting to look good
The story of the quake- and tsunami-stricken Fukushima Daiichi nuclear powerplant continues to unfold, with reports suggesting that the situation with respect to the three damaged reactors at the plant may soon be stabilised without serious consequences. The focus of attention has now moved to problems at a pool used to keep …
Lewis Page, 17 Mar 2011

snippet.title: Sonim XP3 Enduro ultra-rugged mobile phone
snippet.description:
Sonim XP3 Enduro ultra-rugged mobile phone
Launched in November, but only just available in the UK, the Sonim Enduro is hard to kill - very hard. We know - we tried. Sonim XP3 Enduro Sonim's XP3 Enduro: well 'ard Sonim announced its range of toughened handsets back in 2007, and made much of the phones' indestructibility. The specifications list an operational …
Bill Ray, 26 Feb 2009
